description:
Going From Invisible to Influential teaches entrepreneurs or anyone in a specific niche how to stand out from the crowd, stand out from their competitors by making the most of social media platforms so they can ultimately be the "go to" person or expert in their field, that every customer or client will flock to. In this course students are taught as to why it is crucial to harness the power of social media, especially now and even more so in the future.

This course is a mix of videos as well as pdfs, and the course will take a good hour to a hour and a half to complete. Students will learn what the true meaning of influence is; how to create stunning social media profiles, as well as why it is crucial that their profiles need to stand out and be attractive. They will also learn how to create compelling content, and what kind of content to share to their networks that will receive the most reception. They will also be taught how to avoid pitfalls that many entrepreneurs frequently make on their social media that can get them into trouble and damage their reputation. In this course there are resources for finding high quality content for any niche, that can be used to share on networks. Students will be taught what they also must do in order to maintain high engagement with their networks, and they will find out how to properly grow their networks or tribes. Offline and additional tactics will be taught as well as how to reinforce a strong online social influence.
title: Going From Invisible to Influential
